anya-e0201n5:2_0: Atha dhātupaccayasaṁsiddhaṁ kāla, kāraka, purisa, saṅkhyābhedadīpakaṁ liṅgabhedarahitaṁ kriyāpadhānavācakaṁ tyādyantanāmakaṁ ākhyātapadaṁ dīpiyate.
anya-e0201n5:4_0: Tattha bhū, hū, gamu, paca iccādi pakatidhātu nāma sabhāvena siddhattā.
anya-e0201n5:5_0: Titikkha, tikiccha, bubhukkha, jighacchaiccādi vikatidhātu nāma saṅkhatavasena siddhattā.
anya-e0201n5:6_0: Puttīya, pabbatāya iccādi nāmadhātu nāma nāmabhūtassa sato kriyavācīpaccayayogena dhātuṭṭhāne ṭhitattā.
anya-e0201n5:8_0: Tatthayā dhātu kammāpekkhaṁ kriyaṁ vadati, sā sakammikā nāma.
anya-e0201n5:9_0: Yā kammanirapekkhaṁ kriyaṁ vadati, sā akammikā nāma.
anya-e0201n5:11_0: Tattha yā ekakammāpekkhaṁ kriyaṁ vadati, sā ekakammikā nāma.
anya-e0201n5:12_0: Yā padhānā’padhānavasena kammadvayāpekkhaṁ kriyaṁ vadati, sā dvikammikā nāma.
anya-e0201n5:14_0: Tattha yā dhātu pāpanatthā hoti, sā nyādi nāma.
anya-e0201n5:14_1: Ajaṁ gāmaṁ neti, bhāraṁ gāmaṁ vahati, sākhaṁ gāmaṁ ākaḍḍhati.
anya-e0201n5:15_1: Gāviṁ khīraṁ duhati, brāhmaṇaṁ kambalaṁ yācati, dāyakaṁ bhikkhaṁ bhikkhati, goṇaṁ vajaṁ rundhati, bhagavantaṁ pañhaṁ pucchati, sissaṁ dhammaṁ anusāsati, bhagavā bhikkhū etaṁ [vacanaṁ] avoca, rājā amaccaṁ vacanaṁ bravīti iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:16_0: Tattha yadā kammasmiṁ rūpaṁ sijjhati, tadā vibhatti, paccayā nyādimhi padhānakammaṁ vadanti, duhādimhi apadhānakammaṁ, sabbadhātūsu kāritayoge kāritakammanti, sabbañcetaṁ dhātūnaṁ pakatiatthavasena vuttaṁ, anekatthattā pana dhātūnaṁ atthantaravacane vā nānupasaggayoge vā akammikāpi sakammikā honti, sakammikāpi akammikā honti.
anya-e0201n5:21_0: Vida – anubhavane, sukhaṁ vedeti, vipākaṁ paṭisaṁvedeti ma. ni. 3.303.
anya-e0201n5:22_0: Vida – ārocane, vedayāmahaṁ bhante vedayatīti maṁ dhāretu cūḷava. aṭṭha.
anya-e0201n5:24_0: Pada-gatiyaṁ, maggaṁ pajjati, paṭipajjati, maggo uppajjati, nipajjati, sampajjati, bhogo bhavati, sambhavati, bhogaṁ anubhavati, taṇhaṁ abhibhavati, paribhavati, adhibhavati, araññaṁ abhisambhavati, ajjhogāhatīti attho.
anya-e0201n5:24_1: Gacchantaṁ magge abhisambhavati, sampāpuṇātīti attho iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:25_0: Padānaṁ byañjanasampattiyā vā atthasampattiyā vā upakārakā vibhatti, paccayā paccayā nāma.
anya-e0201n5:26_0: Tattha vibhattiyo tyādi, tvādiiccādinā aṭṭhavidhā bhavanti, sarūpato channavutividhā.
anya-e0201n5:28_0: Tattha parahitapaṭisaṁyuttesu ṭhānesu pavattibahulāni padāni parassapadāni nāma.
anya-e0201n5:29_0: Paro vuccati kattā sabbakriyāsādhāraṇattā, attā vuccati kammaṁ sakasakakriyāsādhāraṇattā, parassa abhidhāyakāni padāni parassapadāni, attano abhidhāyakāni padāni attanopadānīti aññe.
anya-e0201n5:30_0: Attā vuccati padatthānaṁ sarīrabhūtā kriyā, kattunā pana sādhyaṭṭhena kriyarūpāni bhāva, kammānipi attāti vuccanti.
anya-e0201n5:30_1: Sādhakaṭṭhena tehi parabhūto kattā paro nāmāti apare.
anya-e0201n5:31_0: Attā vuccati amhattho, paro vuccati tumha, nāmattho, pubbachakkāni parabahulattā parassapadāni nāma, parachakkāni pana rūḷhīvasena attanopadāni nāmātipi vadanti.
anya-e0201n5:31_1: Idaṁ na yujjati parachakkesu tabbahulamattassāpi asiddhattā.
anya-e0201n5:31_2: Pāḷibhāsaṁ pana patvā dvinnaṁ chakkānaṁ attahita, parahitesu vā tīsu kārakesu vā pavattinānāttaṁ na dissatiyeva, tasmā imasmiṁ ganthe taṁ nāmadvayaṁ na gahitanti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0201n5:32_0: Paccayā pana catubbidhā vikaraṇa, kicca, kārita, dhātupaccayavasena.
anya-e0201n5:33_0: Tattha ye dhātusiddhāni tyādipadāni tabbādipadāni ca gaṇavibhāgavasena aññamaññaṁ visadisarūpāni karonti, te vikaraṇapaccayā nāma, la, ya, ṇoiccādayo.
anya-e0201n5:35_0: Paresaṁ āṇāpanasaṅkhāte payojakabyāpāre pavattā ṇi, ṇāpipaccayā kāritapaccayā nāma.
anya-e0201n5:36_0: Visuṁ taṁtaṁkriyavācībhāvena dhāturūpā kha, cha, saiccādikā paccayā dhātupaccayā nāma.
anya-e0201n5:37_0: ‘‘Kāla, kāraka, purisa, saṅkhyābhedadīpaka’’nti ettha atīta, paccuppannā’nāgata, kālavimuttavasena kālabhedo catubbidho.
anya-e0201n5:38_0: Tattha hiyyattanī, ajjattanī ajjatanī (bahūsu), parokkhāti imā tisso vibhattiyo atīte kāle vattanti.
anya-e0201n5:41_0: Sattamī, kālātipattīti dve kālavimutte vattanti, ayaṁ kira porāṇiko vibhattīnaṁ kamo, so ca pāḷiyā sametiyeva.
anya-e0201n5:43_0: Athopi viharissanti, esā buddhāna dhammatā’’ti a. ni. 4.21 ca –
anya-e0201n5:44_0: ‘‘Abbhatītā ca ye buddhā, vattamānā anāgatā’’ti ca apa. thera 1.1.588 pāḷī.
anya-e0201n5:44_1: Imasmiṁ kame pañcamī, sattamīti nāmadvayampi anvatthavasena siddhaṁ bhavati.
anya-e0201n5:44_2: Pacchā pana garuno vatticchāvasena vibhattīnaṁ nānākamaṁ karonti.
anya-e0201n5:45_0: Kattu, kamma, bhāvā pana kārakabhedo nāma.
anya-e0201n5:45_1: Tattha bhāvo duvidho sādhya, sādhanavasena visesana, visesyavasena ca.
anya-e0201n5:46_0: Tesu sādhyabhāvo nānādhātūnaṁ vasena nānāvidho hoti.
anya-e0201n5:46_1: Sādhanabhāvo nānādhātvatthānaṁ pavattākārasaṅkhātena ekaṭṭhena ekova hoti.
anya-e0201n5:46_2: So pana yathā jāti nāma anuppannapakkhe ṭhite saṅkhatadhamme uppādentī viya khāyati, tathā vohāravisayamatte ṭhite sabbadhātvatthe pātubhonte karonto viya khāyati, tasmā so sādhananti ca kārakanti ca vuccati.
anya-e0201n5:46_3: Yathā ca jātivasena uppannā saṅkhatadhammā ‘‘cintanaṁ jātaṁ, phusanaṁ jāta’’ miccādinā ekantameva jātiṁ visesenti, tathā paccayatthavasena pātubhontā nānādhātvatthāpi ‘‘bhuyyate, gamyate, paccate, bhavanaṁ, gamanaṁ, pacana’’ miccādinā ekantameva paccayatthaṁ visesenti.
anya-e0201n5:46_4: Vatticchāvasena pana bhāvasādhanapadesu dhātvattha, paccayatthānaṁ abhedopi vattuṁ yujjatiyeva.
anya-e0201n5:46_5: Idha pana dvīsu bhāvesu sādhanabhāvo adhippetoti.
anya-e0201n5:47_1: ‘Puriso’ti ca ‘‘yaṁkiñcāyaṁ purisapuggalo paṭisaṁvedeti sukhaṁ vā dukkhaṁ vā adukkhamasukhaṁ vā’’ti ma. ni.
anya-e0201n5:47_2: 3.1 ettha attā eva vuccati, so ca attā ‘‘so karoti, so paṭisaṁvedetī’’ti a. ni. 6.43; visuddhi. 2.580 ettha kārakoti vuccati. Iti ‘puriso’ti kārako eva.
anya-e0201n5:48_0: So ca tividho nāmattho, tumhattho, amhattho cāti.
anya-e0201n5:48_1: Tattha attano ajjhattasantānabhūtattā amhattho uttamapuriso nāma, sesā pana kamena paṭhamapuriso, majjhimapurisoti vuccanti.
anya-e0201n5:48_3: Idañca nāmaṁ kārakabhede antogadhamevāti katvā imasmiṁ ganthe na gahitanti.
anya-e0201n5:50_0: ‘Liṅgabhedarahita’nti ‘‘puriso gacchati, itthī gacchati, kulaṁ gacchati’’ iccādīsu ‘puriso’iccādīnaṁ abhidheyyapadānaṁ liṅgānugato rūpabhedo ākhyātapade natthi.
anya-e0201n5:51_0: ‘Kriyāpadhānavācaka’nti ettha kriyaṁ eva padhānato abhidhāti, na nāmapadaṁ viya dabbaṁ padhānato abhidhātīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0201n5:52_0: Tattha kriyā nāma dhātvatthabhāvo vuccati, sā ca kālavasena atītakriyā, paccuppannakriyā, anāgatakriyā, kālavimuttakriyāti catubbidhā hoti.
anya-e0201n5:53_0: Āṇattikriyā, āsiṭṭhakriyā, anumatikriyā, parikappakriyā, araha, sakka, vidhi, nimantanā’mantanādikriyāti bahuvidho kriyābhedoti.
anya-e0201n5:54_0: Bhū-sattāyaṁ, santassa bhāvo sattā, tassaṁ sattāyaṁ, bhūdhātu sattāyamatthe vattate, sabbapadatthānaṁ sadda, buddhivisayabhāvena vijjamānabhāve vattatetyattho.
anya-e0201n5:56_0: Adhikārasuttamidaṁ, kriyatthā paraṁ vibhatti, paccayā bhavantīti attho.
anya-e0201n5:56_2: Pakatidhātu, vikatidhātu, nāmadhātuvasena tividho dhātu, kāritapaccayantarūpampi vikatidhātumhi saṅgayhati.
anya-e0201n5:57_0: 562.Vattamānetianti si tha mi ma te ante se vhe e mheka. 414; rū. 428; nī. 872; caṁ. 1.2.82; pā. 3.2.123.
anya-e0201n5:58_0: Ārabhitvā niṭṭhaṁ anupagato bhāvo vattamāno nāma, taṁsambandhīkālopi tadūpacārena vattamānoti vuccati.
anya-e0201n5:58_1: Vattamāne kāle kriyatthā paraṁ tyādivibhattiyo bhavanti.
anya-e0201n5:58_2: Ayañca vibhatti tyādīti ca vattamānakālavisayattā vattamānāti ca sijjhati.
anya-e0201n5:59_0: 563.Pubbāparachakkānamekānekesu tumhamhasesesu dve dve majjhimuttamapaṭhamāka. 408; rū. 431; nī. 867.
anya-e0201n5:60_0: Tumhanāmaṁ, amhanāmaṁ, tadubhayato sesanāmanti tīsu nāmesu payujjamānesu vā gamyamānesu vā ekasmiṁ vā anekesu vā atthesu pubbachakka, parachakkānaṁ dve dve majjhima, uttama, paṭhamā vibhattiyo bhavanti.
anya-e0201n5:61_0: Ettha ca vibhattividhānamukhena taṁtaṁsaññāvidhānampi siddhaṁ hoti.
anya-e0201n5:62_0: Kathaṁ?Ti, anti, si, tha, mi, ma iti pubbachakkaṁ nāma.
anya-e0201n5:63_0: Te, ante, se, vhe, e, mhe iti parachakkaṁ nāma.
anya-e0201n5:64_0: Pubbachakke ca-ti, antidvayaṁ paṭhamadukaṁ nāma, si, thadvayaṁ majjhimadukaṁ nāma, mi, madvayaṁ uttamadukaṁ nāma. Evaṁ parachakke.
anya-e0201n5:65_0: Tattha tulyādhikaraṇabhūte sesanāme payujjamāne vā gamyamāne vā paṭhamadukaṁ bhavati.
anya-e0201n5:65_2: Dukesu ca ekasmiṁ atthe vattabbe ekavacanaṁ, bahumhi vattabbe bahuvacanaṁ.
anya-e0201n5:66_0: Ettha ca nāmānaṁ atthanissitā katvattha, kammatthā idha nāmatthāti vuccanti.
anya-e0201n5:66_1: Kattu, kammasaṅkhāte yasmiṁ nāmatthe tyādivibhattiyo bhavanti, so nāmattho tyādivācakānaṁ eva vāccabhūto vuttattho nāma hoti, na syādivibhattīnaṁ.
anya-e0201n5:67_0: Vuttakattu, kammādhiṭṭhānassa ca liṅgatthassa vācakaṁ nāmapadaṁ abhidheyyapadaṁ nāma, etadeva tulyādhikaraṇapadanti ca vuccati.
anya-e0201n5:68_0: Amādayo ca atthavācakavibhattiyo etasmiṁ okāsaṁ na labhanti, liṅgatthamattajotikā paṭhamāvibhatti eva okāsaṁ labhati.
anya-e0201n5:68_1: Evarūpāni tulyādhikaraṇabhūtāni abhidheyyapadāni sandhāya sutte ‘tumhamhasesesū’ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0201n5:69_0: Idañca suttaṁ suddhehi tumha’mha, sesanāmehi yuttavākye ca missakehi yuttavākye cāti dvīsu dvīsu vākyesu veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0201n5:70_0: Tattha suddhehi yutte paccekaṁ dukāni vattanti. Yathā?
anya-e0201n5:70_1: So gacchati, te gacchanti, tvaṁ gacchasi, tumhe gacchatha, ahaṁ gacchāmi, mayaṁ gacchāmāti.
anya-e0201n5:71_1: So ca so ca gacchati, gacchanti vā.
anya-e0201n5:71_2: Te ca te ca gacchanti, so ca te ca gacchanti, tvañca tvañca gacchasi, gacchatha vā.
anya-e0201n5:71_3: Tumhe ca tumhe ca gacchatha, tvañca tumhe ca gacchathāti.
anya-e0201n5:72_0: Missakehi yutte dvandavākye pana ‘vippaṭisedhe’ti saṅketattā paradukāni eva okāsaṁ labhanti, tesu ca bahuvacanāni eva. Yathā?
anya-e0201n5:72_1: So ca tvañca gacchatha, so ca ahañca gacchāma, tvañca ahañca gacchāma, so ca tvañca ahañca gacchāma. Ekavacanacatukkaṁ.
anya-e0201n5:73_0: Te ca tumhe ca gacchatha, te ca mayañca gacchāma, tumhe ca mayañca gacchāma, te ca tumhe ca mayañca gacchāma. Bahuvacanacatukkaṁ.
anya-e0201n5:74_0: So ca tumhe ca gacchatha, so ca mayañca gacchāma, tvañca mayañca gacchāma, so ca tvañca mayañca gacchāma. Ekavacanamūlacatukkaṁ.
anya-e0201n5:75_0: Te ca tvañca gacchatha, te ca ahañca gacchāma, tumhe ca ahañca gacchāma, te ca tumhe ca ahañca gacchāma. Bahuvacanamūlacatukkaṁ.
anya-e0201n5:76_0: Api ca tvañca so ca gacchatha, ahañca so ca gacchāma, tvañca ahañca so ca gacchāma, tumhe ca so ca gacchatha, mayañca so ca gacchāma, tvañca te ca gacchatha, ahañca te ca gacchāmaiccādīnipi catukkāni veditabbāni.
anya-e0201n5:77_0: Atrimā pāḷī – tuvañca putto suṇisā ca nattā, sammodamānā gharamāvasetha jā. 1.8.7.
anya-e0201n5:77_1: Ahañca putto suṇisā ca nattā, sammodamānā gharamāvasema jā. 1.8.7.
anya-e0201n5:78_0: Ahañca dāni āyasmā ca sāriputto bhikkhusaṅghaṁ pariharissāma ma. ni. 2.160.
anya-e0201n5:79_0: Ahañca ime ca bhikkhū samādhinā nisīdimhā.
anya-e0201n5:80_0: Ahañca bhariyā ca dānapatī ahumhā jā. 2.22.1593.
anya-e0201n5:81_0: Ahañca sāmiko ca dānapatī ahumhā jā. 2.22.1617 iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:82_0: Yaṁ pana ‘‘so ca gacchati, tvañca gacchasī’’ti vattabbe ‘‘tumhe gacchathā’’ti vā ‘‘so ca gacchati, ahañca gacchāmī’’ti vattabbe ‘‘mayaṁ gacchāmā’’ti vā vacanaṁ, taṁ pakatibahuvacanameva, na paropurisabahuvacanaṁ.
anya-e0201n5:83_1: 216 piṭṭhe suttaṁ, tatthapi sabbesaṁ dvinnaṁ vā tiṇṇaṁ vā missakabhūtānaṁ nāma, tumha’mhānaṁ ekato abhidhāne missakadvandavākye paro puriso yojetabboti attho na na sambhavatīti.
anya-e0201n5:85_0: Aparokkhesu māna, nta, tyādīsu paresu kriyatthā paraṁ kattari lānubandho apaccayo hoti.
anya-e0201n5:86_0: Etena yattha māna, nta, tyādayo kattari vattanti, tattha ayaṁ lapaccayoti lapaccayena tesaṁ kattuvācakabhāvaṁ ñāpeti, esa nayo ‘‘kyo bhāvakammesu…’’ iccādīsupi.
anya-e0201n5:87_0: Ettha ca vikaraṇapaccayā nāma byañjanapūraṇā eva honti, na atthapūraṇā, tasmā yasmiṁ payoge tehi vinā padarūpaṁ na sijjhati, tattheva te vattanti.
anya-e0201n5:87_1: Yattha sijjhati, tattha na vattanti, ayampi lapaccayo dhātuto paraṁ vibhattisare vā āgamasare vā asante vattati, sante pana ‘‘pacāmi, pacāma, pacāhi, gameti, gamenti, vajjeti, vajjenti’’-iccādīsu kāriyantaratthāya vattati.
anya-e0201n5:87_2: Yattha ca paccayānaṁ lopo vihito, tattha gaṇantara, rūpantarappasaṅgapaṭisiddhāya vattati, aññattha na vattati.
anya-e0201n5:89_1: I, kī, khi, ci, ji iccādayo ivaṇṇā nāma.
anya-e0201n5:89_2: Cu, ju, bhū, hū iccādayo uvaṇṇā nāma.
anya-e0201n5:89_3: Paccaye pare ekakkharadhātvantānaṁ ivaṇṇu’vaṇṇānaṁ kamena e, ovuddhiyo honti. ‘Paro kvacī’ti parasaralopo.
anya-e0201n5:90_0: Saṁpubbo-sambhoti , sambhonti, sambhosi, sambhotha, sambhomi, sambhoma.
anya-e0201n5:91_0: Anupubbo-anubhavane, so bhogaṁ anubhoti, te bhogaṁ anubhonti, tvaṁ bhogaṁ anubhosi, tumhe bhogaṁ anubhotha, ahaṁ bhogaṁ anubhomi, mayaṁ bhogaṁ anubhoma.
anya-e0201n5:92_0: Tattha yathā ‘‘nīlo paṭo’’ti ettha nīlasaddassa attho duvidho vāccattho, abhidheyyatthoti.
anya-e0201n5:95_0: Nīlasaddo pana vaccātthameva ujuṁ vadati, nīlasaddamattaṁ suṇanto nīlaguṇameva ujuṁ jānāti, tasmā ‘‘paṭo’’ iti padantarena nīlasaddassa abhidheyyattho ācikkhīyati.
anya-e0201n5:96_0: Tathā ‘‘anubhotī’’ti ettha tisaddassa attho duvidho vāccattho, abhidheyyatthoti.
anya-e0201n5:99_0: Tisaddo pana vāccatthameva ujuṁ vadati, na abhidheyyatthaṁ.
anya-e0201n5:99_1: ‘‘Anubhotī’’ti suṇantosādhyakriyāsahitaṁ kattārameva ujuṁ jānāti, na kiñci dabbanti attho.
anya-e0201n5:99_2: Tasmā ‘‘so’’ iti padantarena tisaddassa abhidheyyattho ācikkhīyati, vāccatthassa pana tisaddeneva ujuṁ vuttattā tatiyāvibhattiyā puna ācikkhitabbakiccaṁ natthi, liṅgatthajotanatthaṁ abhidheyyapade paṭhamāvibhatti eva pavattatīti. Esa nayo sabbattha.
anya-e0201n5:101_0: Sare pare e, onaṁ kamena aya, avā honti. Ya, vesu a-kāro uccāraṇattho.
anya-e0201n5:104_0: Hi, mi, mesu paresu a-kārassa dīgho hoti.
anya-e0201n5:106_0: Parachakke – bhavate, bhavante, bhavase, bhavavhe, bhave, bhavamhe.
anya-e0201n5:108_0: Adhyā’bhi, paripubbo hiṁsāyaṁ, adhibhavati, abhibhavati, paribhavati.
anya-e0201n5:109_0: Vipubbo vināse, pākaṭe, sobhaṇe ca, vibhavati.
anya-e0201n5:111_0: Abhi, saṁpubbo pattiyaṁ, ajjhogāhe ca, abhisambhavati, tathā pātubbhavati, āvibhavati iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:114_0: 568.Kyobhāvakammesvaparokkhesu māna nta tyādīsuka. 440; rū. 445; nī. 920; caṁ. 1.1.80; pā. 3.1.67.
anya-e0201n5:115_0: Parokkhāvajjitesu māna, ntapaccayesu tyādīsu ca paresu kriyatthā bhāvasmiṁ kammani ca kānubandho yapaccayo hoti, bahulādhikārā kvaci kattari ca.
anya-e0201n5:116_0: Rūpaṁ vibhuyyati, so pahīyissati saṁ. ni.

anya-e0201n5:1354_0: Kārite-so kāresi, kārayi, kārāpesi, kārāpayi, te kāresuṁ, kārayuṁ, kārāpesuṁ, kārāpayuṁ iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:1355_0: Karissati saṅkharissati, kubbissati, krubbissati, kayirissati iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:1356_0: ‘‘Harassa cāhaṅa sse’ti ssena saha karassa rakārassa āhaṅa hoti, kāhati, kāhanti, kathaṁ kāhanti dārakā jā. 2.22.1849.
anya-e0201n5:1357_0: Iñāgame-kāhiti, kāhinti iccādi. Kāhasi, kāhatha. Kāhāmi kusalaṁ bahuṁ jā.
anya-e0201n5:1358_0: ‘Āīādīsū’ti sutte yogavibhāgena ssatyādīsupi kā hoti, saṁyoge rassattaṁ, kassati, kassanti, kassasi, kassatha, kassāmi, kassāma, kassaṁ purisakāriyaṁ jā. 2.22.131.
anya-e0201n5:1367_0: Pubbachakke ovikaraṇassa kvaci u hoti vā.
anya-e0201n5:1373_0: Tanadhātussa na-kārassa ā hoti vā kyamhi.
anya-e0201n5:1374_1: ‘‘Ito’dāni patāyanti, sūciyo balisāni cā’’ti jā. 1.6.84 pāḷi. Tāyate, tāyante.
anya-e0201n5:1375_0: Saka-sattiyaṁ, sakkoti, sakkonti, sakkosi, sakkotha, sakkomi, sakkoma.
anya-e0201n5:1379_0: Āpa, kamu, gaṇa, ghaṭa, cinta, ceta, cura, dhara, pāla, pūja, manta, māna, vida.
anya-e0201n5:1381_0: Curādīhi kriyatthehi paraṁ sakatthe ṇipaccayo hoti.
anya-e0201n5:1384_0: Kamu-icchāyaṁ, kāmeti, kāmayati, kāmenti, kāmayanti, nikāmeti, nikāmayati, nikāmenti, nikāmayanti.
anya-e0201n5:1388_0: Gaṇa-saṅkhyāne, gaṇa, ghaṭānaṁ tudādittā na vuddhi, gaṇeti, gaṇayati.
anya-e0201n5:1390_0: Cinta-cintāyaṁ, garupantattā na vuddhi, cinteti, cintayati.
anya-e0201n5:1394_0: Īādimhi-cintesi, cintayi, cinteyuṁ, cintayuṁ, cintesi, cintayi, cintayittha, cintesiṁ, cintayiṁ, cintesimhā, cintayimhā.
anya-e0201n5:1399_0: Pūja-pūjāyaṁ, garupantattā na vuddhi, pūjeti, pūjayati, pūjenti, pūjayanti.
anya-e0201n5:1401_0: Āpubbo kathane āmantane ca. Āmantayāmi vo bhikkhave dī. ni.
anya-e0201n5:1403_0: Īādimhi-mantesi , mantayi, āmantesi, āmantayi, nimantesi, nimantayi, mantesuṁ, mantayuṁ, mantayiṁsu rahogatā jā.
anya-e0201n5:1403_1: 2.22.1918, mantessati, āmantessati, nimantessati, mantayissati, āmantayissati, nimantayissati iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:1404_0: Māna-pūjāyaṁ, māneti, mānayati, mānenti, mānayanti iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:1406_0: Paṭi, ni, papubbo ācikkhane, paṭivedeti, paṭivedayati, nivedeti, nivedayati, pavedeti, pavedayati iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:1411_0: Kriyāvācībhāvena dhāturūpā paccayā dhātupaccayā, kriyatthapaccayāti vuttaṁ hoti, tasmā tehipi sabbesaṁ tyādi, tabbādivibhatti, paccayānaṁ sambhavo.
anya-e0201n5:1413_0: 693.Tijamānehi khasā khamāvīmaṁsāsuka. 433; rū. 528; nī. 906-9; caṁ. 1.1.17, 28; pā. 3.1.5.
anya-e0201n5:1414_0: Khamāyaṁ vīmaṁsāyañca pavattehi tija, mānadhātūhi paraṁ kamena kha, sapaccayā honti.
anya-e0201n5:1417_0: Kha , cha, sapaccayantānaṁ dhāturūpānaṁ paṭhamaṁ saddarūpaṁ ekassaraṁ dverūpaṁ hotīti ‘tija, tija’iti dvirūpe kate ‘loponādibyañjanassā’ti anādibyañjanabhūtassa ja-kārassa lopo, ‘pararūpamayakāre byañjane’ti dhātvantajakārassa pararūpattaṁ.
anya-e0201n5:1417_1: ‘Catutthadutiyesvesaṁ tatiyapaṭhamā’ti saṁyogādissa khassa kattaṁ, ‘titikkha’iti dhātupaccayantarūpaṁ, tato tyādyuppatti.
anya-e0201n5:1426_0: 695.Mānassa vī parassa ca maṁka. 463-7; rū. 532-3; nī. 944.
anya-e0201n5:1427_0: Dvitte pubbassa mānassa vī hoti, parassa ca sabbassa mānassa maṁ hoti.
anya-e0201n5:1432_1: Māna-pūjāyaṁ, māneti, sammāneti, abhimāneti, pūjetīti attho.
anya-e0201n5:1434_0: 696.Kitā tikicchāsaṁsayesu choka. 433; rū. 528; nī. 906-9; caṁ. 1.1.18; pā. 3.1.5 kā.
anya-e0201n5:1435_0: Tikicchāyaṁ saṁsaye ca pavattakitadhātuto paraṁ cho hoti.
anya-e0201n5:1438_0: Saṁsayamhā aññasmiṁ tikicchatthe pavattassa kitadhātussa dvitte pubbassa kitassati hoti vā.
anya-e0201n5:1439_1: Devāpi naṁ tikicchanti, mātāpettibharaṁ naraṁ jā. 2.22.408.
anya-e0201n5:1442_0: Vāsaddena tikārābhāve ‘kavaggahānaṁ cavaggajā’ti dvitte pubbassa cavaggo, cikicchati, cikicchanti, cikicchīyati, cikicchīyanti.
anya-e0201n5:1445_0: Kita-ñāṇe nivāse ca, ketati, saṁketati, niketati.
anya-e0201n5:1447_0: 698.Nindāyaṁ gupabadhā bassa bho caka. 433; rū. 528; caṁ. 1.1.19, 20; pā. 3.1.5, 6 kā.
anya-e0201n5:1448_0: Nindāyaṁ pavattehi gupa, badhehi paraṁ chapaccayo hoti, bassa ca bho hoti.
anya-e0201n5:1450_0: Gupissa dvitte pubbassa u-kārassa i hoti.
anya-e0201n5:1450_1: Gassa cavaggattaṁ, dhātvantassa pararūpattaṁ, saṁyogādissa paṭhamattaṁ.
anya-e0201n5:1457_0: Dvitte pubbassa assa i hoti kha, cha, sesūti assa ittaṁ, parabakārassa ca bhattaṁ, dhātvantassa pararūpādi.
anya-e0201n5:1459_1: Badha-bandhana, hiṁsāsu, bādheti, bādhayati. Vātaṁ jālena bādhesi jā. 1.12.8.
anya-e0201n5:1463_0: 701.Tuṁsmā lopo cicchāyaṁ teka. 434; rū. 534; nī. 910; caṁ. 1.1.22; pā. 3.1.7.
anya-e0201n5:1464_0: Tumantehi icchatthe te kha, cha, sā honti, tuṁpaccayassa ca lopo hoti.
anya-e0201n5:1464_1: Idañca suttaṁ tumicchatthasambhave sati sabbadhātupadehipi kha, cha, sānaṁ pavattidīpanatthaṁ.
anya-e0201n5:1464_2: Tena tumicchatthe sa, chapaccaye katvā ‘ū byañjanassā’ti sa, chānaṁ ādimhi īāgamaṁ katvā ‘‘aputtaṁ puttamiva ācarituṁ icchati puttīyīsati, pabbato viya attānaṁ ācarituṁ icchati pabbatāyīsati, dātuṁ icchati dicchati’’ iccādīni sijjhanti.
anya-e0201n5:1465_0: Bhuja, ghasa, hana, ji, hara, pā, su.
anya-e0201n5:1466_0: Bhuñjituṁ icchatīti atthe-bhujato khapaccayo, tuṁpaccayalopo, dvittaṁ, pubbassa anādilopo, pararūpatte saṁyogādissa paṭhamattaṁ, pubbassa bhassa battaṁ, bubhukkhati, bubhukkhanti, bubhukkhīyati, bubhukkhīyanti, bubhukkheti, bubhukkhayati, bubhukkhāpeti, bubhukkhāpayati, bubhukkhāpīyati, bubhukkhāpīyanti, bubhukkhatu, bubhukkhantu, bubhukkheyya, bubhukkheyyuṁ, bubhukkhi, bubhukkhiṁsu, bubhukkhissati, bubhukkhissanti, bubhukkhissā, bubhukkhissaṁsu.
anya-e0201n5:1467_0: Ghasa-adane, ghasituṁ icchatīti atthe – chapaccayo, dvittādi, pubbassa ghassa gattaṁ, gassa jattaṁ, assa ittaṁ, jighacchati, jighacchanti, jighacchīyati, jighacchīyanti, jighaccheti, jighacchāpeti iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:1468_0: Hana-hiṁ sāyaṁ, hantuṁ icchatīti atthe – chapaccayo, dvittādi, ‘kavaggahānaṁ cavaggajā’ti pubbassa hassa jo, assa ittaṁ.
anya-e0201n5:1470_0: Dvitte parassa hanassa ghaṁ hoti se pare.
anya-e0201n5:1472_0: Ji-jaye, jetuṁ icchatīti atthe – sapaccayo, dvittaṁ.
anya-e0201n5:1474_0: Ji, harānaṁ dvitte parassa jissa harassa ca gī hoti se pare.
anya-e0201n5:1476_0: Hara-haraṇe, dvittādi, parassa gī, pubbassa hassa jo, assa ittaṁ, jigīsati, harituṁ icchatīti attho, jigīsanti.
anya-e0201n5:1477_0: Pā-pāne, pivituṁ icchatīti atthe – sapaccayo, dvittaṁ, ‘rasso pubbassā’ti rasso, assa ittaṁ, pipāsati, pipāsanti, pipāsīyati, pipāsīyanti.
anya-e0201n5:1478_0: Su-savane, sotuṁ icchatīti atthe – dvitte parassa dvittaṁ, sussusati sussūsati (bahūsu), sussusanti, sussusīyati, sussusīyanti, sussuseti, sussusayati, sussusāpeti, sussusāpayati, sussusāpīyati, sussusāpīyanti, sussusatu, sussusantu iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:1479_0: Titikkhituṁ icchatīti atthe – titikkhato sapaccayo, sapaccayaparattā puna dvittappasaṅge –
anya-e0201n5:1481_0: Sakiṁ dvitte kate puna dvittaṁ na āpajjatīti puna dvittābhāvo, ‘ū byañjanassā’ti ū āgamo.
anya-e0201n5:1482_1: Evaṁ tikicchituṁ icchatīti tikicchisati, tikicchisanti, cikicchisati, cikicchisanti iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:1483_0: Iti tumicchatthe kha, cha, sa rāsi.
anya-e0201n5:1487_0: Kammatthā nāmapadamhā icchatthe īyo hotīti kammabhūtā puttasaddato icchāyaṁ īyo, ‘puttīya’iti dhātupaccayantarūpaṁ, tato tyādyuppatti.
anya-e0201n5:1488_0: Puttīyati, puttīyanti, puttīyeti, puttīyayati, puttīyāpeti, puttīyāpayati, puttīyāpīyati, puttīyāpīyanti.
anya-e0201n5:1488_1: Evaṁ cīvarīyati, cīvarīyanti, pattīyati, pattīyanti, parikkhārīyati, parikkhārīyanti iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:1491_0: Upamīyati upametabbo attho etenāti upamānaṁ, upamānabhūtā kammapadato ācāratthe īyo hoti.
anya-e0201n5:1493_0: Kamme-aputtopi putto viya ācarīyati puttīyīyati, puttīyīyanti, puttīyeti, puttīyayati, puttīyāpeti, puttīyāpayati, puttīyāpīyati, puttīyāpīyanti. Evaṁ sissīyati, sissīyanti.
anya-e0201n5:1496_0: Upamānabhūtā ādhārabhūtā ca nāmamhā ācāratthe īyo hoti.
anya-e0201n5:1497_0: Kuṭīyati, kuṭīyanti pāsāde, nadiyaṁ viya samudde ācarati nadīyati, nadīyanti iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:1498_0: Araññe viya nagare ācarati araññīyati, araññīyanti nagare. Evaṁ gehīyati vihāre.
anya-e0201n5:1499_0: Lokadhammehi akampanīyaṭṭhena pabbato viya attānaṁ ācaratīti atthe –
anya-e0201n5:1501_0: Upamānabhūtā kattubhūtā ca nāmamhā ācāratthe āyo hotīti pabbatasaddato āyo. Tato tyādyuppatti.
anya-e0201n5:1502_0: Pabbatāyati saṅgho, pabbatāyanti, cicciṭo viya attānaṁ ācarati cicciṭāyati, saddo.
anya-e0201n5:1502_1: Evaṁ paṭapaṭāyati, kaṭakaṭāyati, dhūmadhūmāyati, dhūpāyati, sandhūpāyati.
anya-e0201n5:1505_0: Cīpaccayassa attho abbhūtatabbhāvo jhattho nāma. Kattuto jhatthe āyo hoti.
anya-e0201n5:1506_0: Bhusāyati, bhusāyanti, apaṭopi paṭo bhavati paṭāyati, paṭāyanti, alohitampi lohitaṁ bhavati lohitāyati.
anya-e0201n5:1506_1: Evaṁ nīlāyati, kamalāyati, candāyati, candanāyati, kañcanāyati, vajirāyati.
anya-e0201n5:1510_0: Saddādīhi dutiyantehi nāmehi karotyatthe āyo hoti.
anya-e0201n5:1511_0: Saddāyati, saddāyanti, veraṁ karoti verāyati, verāyanti, kalahaṁ karoti kalahāyati, kalahāyanti, mettaṁ karoti mettāyati, mettāyanti, karuṇaṁ karoti karuṇāyati, karuṇāyanti, muditaṁ karoti muditāyati, muditāyanti, upekkhaṁ karoti upekkhāyati, upekkhāyanti, kukkuccaṁ karoti kukkuccāyati, kukkuccāyanti, piyaṁ karoti piyāyati, piyāyanti, paccayaṁ saddahanaṁ karoti pattiyāyati, pattiyāyanti, taṇhaṁ karoti taṇhāyati, taṇhāyanti, taṇhīyati, taṇhīyanti vā, karotyatthe īyo.
anya-e0201n5:1518_0: Dhātvattho vuccati yā kāci kriyā. Nāmasmā dhātvatthe i hoti.
anya-e0201n5:1520_1: ‘Ṇiṇāpyāpīhi vā’ti ettha vāsaddena lapaccayo, samānayati, samānayanti, piṇaṁ karoti piṇeti, piṇayati, kusalaṁ pucchati kusaleti, kusalayati, visuddhaṁ hoti visuddheti, visuddhayati, vīṇāya upagāyati upavīṇeti, upavīṇāyati, paññāya atikkamati atipaññeti, atipaññāyati, vaccaṁ karoti vacceti, vaccayati, muttaṁ karoti mutteti, muttayati, balena pīḷeti baleti, balayati.
anya-e0201n5:1525_0: Saccāpeti , saccāpenti, atthavibhāgaṁ karoti atthāpeti, atthāpenti, bedasatthaṁ karoti bedāpeti, bedāpenti, sukkhaṁ karoti sukkhāpeti, sukkhāpenti, sukhaṁ karoti sukhāpeti, sukhāpenti, dukkhaṁ karoti dukkhāpeti, dukkhāpenti, uṇhaṁ karoti uṇhāpeti, uṇhāpenti iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:1526_0: Aputtaṁ puttamiva ācarati puttīyati, puttīyituṁ icchatīti atthe ‘tuṁsmā lopo cicchāyaṁ te’ti sapaccayo.
anya-e0201n5:1528_0: Icchīyatīti iṭṭhaṁ, yaṁ yaṁ iṭṭhaṁ yathiṭṭhaṁ. ‘‘Yamiṭṭha’’ntipi pāṭho.
anya-e0201n5:1528_1: Syādyantassa yathiṭṭhaṁ ekassaraṁ ādibhūta’maññaṁ vā dverūpaṁ hoti, na tyādissa viya ādibhūtamevāti attho. ‘Ū byañjanassā’ti ū āgamo.
anya-e0201n5:1531_0: Akamalaṁ kamalaṁ bhavati kamalāyati, kamalāyituṁ icchatīti kakamalāyisati, kamamalāyisati, kamalalāyisati iccādi.
